title: Mark Carney on the Energy Transition
itunes:title: Mark Carney on the Energy Transition
description:
Today’s episode features an interview from BNEF’s recent Summit in New York City, where Ethan Zindler, Head of Americas for BNEF, spoke with Mark Carney, UN Special Envoy for Climate Action and Finance and Chair of the Glasgow Financial Alliance for Net Zero (GFANZ). As emphasis on sustainable finance grows and reporting frameworks refine, he highlights the importance of corporate disclosure. Mark also shares his perspective on the role of renewable energy in the energy transition, and how it presents an opportunity for greater energy security. 

To find out about BNEF’s Summits and to listen to more interviews, go to about.bnef.com/summit/. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
